5:["$","div",null,{"className":"min-h-screen bg-gradient-to-b from-slate-50 to-white","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"max-w-4xl mx-auto px-4 py-12","children":[["$","$L10",null,{"href":"/blog","className":"text-gray-600 hover:text-orange-600 mb-8 block","children":"返回博客"}],["$","article",null,{"className":"bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-sm border border-gray-200 overflow-hidden","children":[["$","div",null,{"className":"bg-gradient-to-br from-orange-500 to-red-600 p-12 text-white","children":[["$","div",null,{"className":"flex items-center gap-4 mb-4 text-sm opacity-90","children":[["$","span",null,{"children":"2026-02-14"}],["$","span",null,{"children":"25 分钟"}]]}],["$","h1",null,{"className":"text-3xl font-bold","children":"OpenClaw 完全指南：从零搭建你的 AI 助手"}]]}],["$","div",null,{"className":"$11","dangerouslySetInnerHTML":{"__html":"<h1>OpenClaw 完全指南</h1>\n<p>OpenClaw 是一个强大的开源 AI 网关，让你能够通过熟悉的聊天应用与 AI 助手对话。</p>\n<h2>什么是 OpenClaw？</h2>\n<p>OpenClaw 的核心是一个 AI Agent 网关，它：</p>\n<ul>\n<li>连接多个聊天应用（WhatsApp、Telegram、Discord 等）</li>\n<li>提供丰富的工具系统（浏览器、命令执行、文件操作等）</li>\n<li>完全自托管，数据由你掌控</li>\n</ul>\n<h2>核心功能</h2>\n<h3>1. 多频道支持</h3>\n<p>同时接入多个聊天应用，统一管理和回复消息。</p>\n<h3>2. 工具系统</h3>\n<ul>\n<li><strong>Browser</strong>: 控制浏览器，访问网页</li>\n<li><strong>Exec</strong>: 执行系统命令</li>\n<li><strong>Search</strong>: 网络搜索</li>\n<li><strong>File</strong>: 文件读写操作</li>\n</ul>\n<h3>3. 会话管理</h3>\n<ul>\n<li>持久化对话历史</li>\n<li>多会话并行</li>\n<li>长期记忆</li>\n</ul>\n<h2>快速开始</h2>\n<ol>\n<li>安装 OpenClaw</li>\n<li>配置 AI 提供商</li>\n<li>接入聊天应用</li>\n<li>开始对话</li>\n</ol>\n<h2>结语</h2>\n<p>OpenClaw 让 AI 助手触手可及，无需切换应用即可享受 AI 的强大能力。</p>\n"}}]]}]]}]}]
